monster.name: Binkers
languages: reads all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Lethargy
entries: Binkers suffers a {@dice 1d20-5|-5} penalty when rolling initiative.

trait.name: Pickpocketing
entries: Binkers can use 2 actions to pickpocket anyone within 10 ft of her, using {@skill Sleight of Hand}. If the targeted creature is engaged in combat, Binkers rolls with advantage.

action.name: Hug
entries: The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 9}). Until this grapple ends, the creature moves at half-speed and is {@condition restrained}. Binkers can only Hug one creature at a time.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: A bookwyrm's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 10}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Word Walker
entries: The bookwyrm can expend 5 feet of movement to vanish into an adjacent book or scroll. Whilst in the book of scroll, an ink image of the bookwyrm appears on the surface. The snake can expend another 5 feet of movement to appear within 5 feet of the paper. If the paper is damaged, the bookwyrm is destroyed.

trait.name: Fragile
entries: If the bookwyrm gets wet, it is destroyed and must be resummoned.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} {@damage 1} piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw, taking 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Byzantine Snail
languages: reads all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Riddle Me This
entries: If left for a minute on a puzzle, lock or clue, the snail can grant {@action Help} on any attempt made to solve it. In such a case, the creature making the check adds an extra {@dice 1d4} to the result.

trait.name: Emotional Support
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the emotion absorber fails a Wisdom saving throw, it may use its reaction to have the affected creature succeed instead. The emotion absorber cannot use this ability again until it completes a long rest.

Where applicable, the emotion absorber takes on the emotional state that would have been conferred by the failed saving throw (e.g. {@condition frightened}, confused, etc.) until it completes a long rest.

trait.name: Rage
entries: When it loses hit points due to an enemy melee attack, the Fowlbear enters a rage that lasts for 1 minute. Whilst enraged, it cannot be reduced below 1 hit point and has advantage on attack rolls.

trait.name: Don't Lose Your Head
entries: If the fowlbear takes 5 or more slashing damage, it loses its head, becoming {@condition blinded} and silenced until the head is re-attached or it is resummoned. Needless to say, a fowlbear only has one head to lose.

trait.name: Sunrise Screamer
entries: At dawn, if the Fowlbear can see the sky, it screeches loudly enough to awaken or alert every creature within 100 feet of it.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage.

monster.name: Happy Heckpup
languages: understands infernal but can't speak it

trait.name: Fiery Bark (3/day)
entries: The Happy Heckpup barks fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 ({@dice 1d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage and {@damage 1} fire damage.

trait.name: Hummer
entries: The hummingsquirrel emits a low humming whenever it is airborne from the flutter of its wings.

action.name: Eviscerate
entries: The hummingsquirrel makes three bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d4 + 7}) piercing damage.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Soulsight
entries: The Infernal Duck knows when it encounters a creature without a soul.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Mr Tum's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The cat has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Catatonic
entries: Mr Tums can cast spells whilst asleep and retains a vague awareness of his surroundings. If touched while sleeping, he can cast any of the spells from his Innate Spellcasting feature as a reaction on the perpetrator(s).

trait.name: *Golden Slumbers
entries: If Mr Tums is allowed to sleep for a full 23 uninterrupted hours, he will cast {@spell dream} on a creature of his caretaker's choice. If no creature is chosen, he communicates with his caretaker using {@spell dream} instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Mr Tums has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} {@damage 1} slashing damage.

monster.name: Mus Vacanti
languages: understands all languages, but can't speak

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The rat has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sound.

trait.name: Shrill
entries: Ginger dislikes most people, and as a result responds negatively to their intrusion into 'her' territory. Ginger functions as per the {@spell alarm} spell, but only provides an audible alarm in the form of offended shrieking.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} {@damage 1} piercing damage.

action.name: None
entries: It is a rock.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The pugataurian has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the pugataurian moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a mace attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: A shuteye moth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Solmnolent Wingbeats (3/day)
entries: The shuteye moth can use an action to secrete a fine powder that functions as a {@spell sleep} spell, affecting {@dice 2d8} hit points of creatures. This version of the spell affects creature immune to magical sleep, such as elves, but fails to affect creatures immune to the {@condition Poisoned} condition.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The rat has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Indefatigable
entries: The hamster can hold its breath indefinitely, and is not harmed by exposure to vacuums or the phlogiston.

trait.name: Moonwalking
entries: The hamster has a hover speed equal to its walking speed.

trait.name: King of the Rodents
entries: Rats, mice and other small vermin are {@condition frightened} of the tyrannohamsterus micropod whilst they are within 30 feet of it.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} {@damage 1} piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: A toad in the hole's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 9}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Toadhole
entries: As an action, the Toad in the Hole creates a tiny extradimensional hole in an adjacent surface. The space can hold as many as eight Tiny or smaller creatures, and the entrance is {@condition invisible} to onlookers. Attacks and spells can't cross through the entrance into or out of the extradimensional space, but those inside can see out of it through a window centred on the entrance. This effect lasts up to 1 hour, Anything inside the extradimensional space drops out when the effect ends.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The frog can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The frog's long jump is up to 10 feet and its high jump is up to 5 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Handle With Care
entries: If the volatile pigeon becomes {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, it explodes, dealing {@damage 1} fire damage to each creature within 5 feet and setting flammable objects alight.

trait.name: Wary
entries: A volatile pigeon is {@condition frightened} of dogs, cats and lawyers it can see within 5 feet of it.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} {@damage 1} piercing damage.
